lead_paragraph: Guards Damian Lillard and C.J. McCollum combined for 59 points to lift the Portland Trail Blazers past the Los Angeles Clippers 96-88 Saturday night at the Moda Center.

headline.print_headline: Trail Blazers Get Back Into Series With Game 3 Win
headline.main: Trail Blazers Get Back Into Series With Game 3 Win

snippet: Guards Damian Lillard and C.J. McCollum combined for 59 points to lift the Portland Trail Blazers past the Los Angeles Clippers 96-88 Saturday night at the Moda Center....
